text: was a Japanese film director and screenwriter. He was known for directing and writing Tora-san, His Tender Love, Oishinbo and Pecoross' Mother and Her Days. Morisaki died from a cerebral infarction on 16 July 2020 in Chigasaki, Japan at the age of 92.Eiga kantoku Morisaki Azuma-san shikyo ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Japanese movie directors Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Japanese screenwriters Category:Deaths from cerebral infarction
title: Azuma Morisaki
